author: rickmcguire
msg: GERONIMO-4125 Mismatch in predefined Internet headers with Sun implementation
Discovered while testing Apache James with the geronimo javamail

author: rpluem
msg: * Increase the size of the mapped block from 16k to 64k since the default page
size for linux on ppc64 architecture is sometimes 64k depending on how the
kernel was compiled. The increase in the block size does not harm any
platforms where this test worked before as 64k is a multiple of 16k.

author: veithen
msg: * Enhanced TestMessageContextBuilder to be able to build Axis2MessageContexts as well.

author: eglynn
msg: Added test asserting tolerance for empty or bogus HTTP Host headers on "?wsdl" queries (as set by some HTTP load balancers)

author: saminda
msg: AxisConfiguration will be created from a very minimal axis2.xml. Next step is to integrate listeners as OSGi services
